original_title: GM, employee arrested for sexual abuse on three insurance company women
original_body_lines: A general manager and an employee of an insurance company in the Puttalam area have been arrested in connection with sexual abuse of three female employees of an insurance company.
Police said the Children and Women's Bureau of Puttalam Police Division initiated an investigation based on a complaint.
The arrested suspects, aged 33 and 45, are residents of Puttalam.
The suspects were released on a Rs.500,000 bail each after being produced before the Puttalam Magistrate. (Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
